entities.name: the cave
entities.description: The cave is described as a location where Harry swims with Dumbledore. It has a fissure that opens into a dark tunnel and is filled with water at high tide.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the protagonist of the story who swims with Dumbledore in the cave.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person who leads Harry through the cave and has silver hair and dark robes.

relationships.description: Harry enters the cave by swimming with Dumbledore.
Dumbledore leads Harry into the cave.
Harry follows Dumbledore through the cave.
The cave is filled with water at high tide.
